name: blue-blocker
author: DanielleMiu
description: Blocks all Twitter Blue verified users on twitter.com

scripts.version: node -e "const fs = require('fs').promises; fs.readFile('./src/manifest.ts','utf-8').then(oldManifest => oldManifest.replace(/(?:\d+\.){2}(?:\d)(?:-[\w\d\-\.]*)?/, process.env.npm_package_version)).then(newManifest => fs.writeFile('./src/manifest.ts', newManifest, 'utf-8'))" && git add ./src/manifest.ts ./package*.json && echo updated manifest, new version:
